title: Mathematics Teacher Competency Development Program for Transitioning to Online Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in elementary mathematics instruction and basic competency in online educational tools
context.additional_context: Designed for learners with time constraints as working professionals. Operated in a simulation/VR environment assuming real classroom scenarios, focusing on practical training.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more effective instructional designs for online math classes in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can resolve technical issues arising during the transition to ODL (Online Distance Learning) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply two or more strategies to analyze student engagement for adaptive lesson design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
